data.title: How to Split Sands With Haunt
data.description: This Haunt lineup scans all of Sands and a bit into Rafters, your teammates will have an easy time spamming through the door or simply fighting for control of it.

data.title: Default Dish Haunt From Barrier
data.description: Use this default Haunt lineup to scan any Defenders playing at Dish.

data.title: B Site Execute Haunt From Arcade
data.description: Enable your teammates pushing from Arcade or Tree with this Haunt, as it scans most of site and into Generator.

data.title: Attacker Default Haunt to Arcade From Barrier
data.description: Use this Haunt during your defaults to gather information on any Defender Arcade, and a bit into Tower.

data.title: Early Round B Arcade Haunt from B Bench
data.description: Here's a great early round Haunt from the B Bench spawn barrier for Arcade.

data.title: Early Round A Main Haunt to Push Back Oppers
data.description: Here's a great early round Haunt for A Main, that not only gives your team valuable information inside of A Main, but also makes it difficult for enemy oppers holding an angle on the Attacker Spawn entrance into A Main to continue to hold that angle.
